name: Dumb Stone
description:
If you like UNO you will love this game! Same as in uno you have to get rid off all your cards, if you are the last one with cards in the hand you are the DUMB STONE! It is a new crazy card game and it is a four player online card game ! Play against your friends and have fun with funny cards and tactical card game battles or play against the CPU.

Features:
- Funny cartoon art work (by mikemac2d)
- Four player online card battle game
- Singleplayer mode included!
- Get the physical cards in the online shop!
